entry.title: Introduction
entry.summary: The discussion started with a comparison between run script and init script. Later, Fred Concklin expressed interest in work to daemonize bitcoin on boot and integrating it into general coding and implementation paradigms seen on GNU/Linux platforms. Douglas Huff replied that it already works fine in this regard using standard tools and especially easy with daemontools/runit. However, Luke-Jr clarified that Fred was referring to standard coding and implementation paradigms and coming up with a standard for a Wallet protocol. The discussion ended with a link to the Bitcoin wiki page on Wallet protocol.
